content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type =="email_delivery"
| make-series Count=count() default=0 on ['Event Time'] step 1d by Direction
content.title: Email Traffic

content.query:
let min_t = toscalar(
    MimecastCG 
    | where Type == "email_receipt" and isnotempty(['Rejection Type'])
    | summarize min_time = min(['Event Time'])
    | extend min_t = iff(isempty(min_time),now(),min_time)
    | project min_t);
MimecastCG 
| where Type == "email_receipt" and isnotempty(['Rejection Type']) 
| make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on ['Event Time'] from min_t to now() step 1d by tostring(['Rejection Type']) 
| project-away ['Event Time'] 
| extend Count = array_sum(Trend) 
| project ['Rejection Type'] , Count, ['Spark Line'] = Trend 
| order by Count desc
content.title: Rejections

content.query:
let min_t = toscalar(
    MimecastCG 
    | where Type == "email_delivery" and isnotempty(['Rejection Type'])
    | summarize min_time = min(['Event Time'])
    | extend min_t = iff(isempty(min_time),now(),min_time)
    | project min_t);
MimecastCG 
| where Type == "email_delivery" and isnotempty(['Rejection Type'])
| make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on ['Event Time'] from min_t to now() step 1d by tostring(['Rejection Type']) 
| project-away ['Event Time'] 
| extend Count = array_sum(Trend) 
| project ['Rejection Type'], Count, ['Spark Line'] = Trend 
| order by Count desc
content.title: Delivery Failures

content.query:
let min_t = toscalar(
    MimecastCG
    | where Type == "email_process" and isnotempty(['Hold Reason'])
    | summarize min_time = min(['Event Time'])
    | extend min_t = iff(isempty(min_time),now(),min_time)
    | project min_t);
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_process" and isnotempty(['Hold Reason'])
| make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on ['Event Time'] from min_t to now() step 1d by tostring(['Hold Reason'])
| project-away ['Event Time']
| extend Count=array_sum(Trend)
| project ['Hold Reason'], Count,['Spark Line'] = Trend
| order by Count desc
content.title: Held

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type== "email_receipt"
| summarize  count() by Direction, Action, ['Sender IP']
| summarize sum(count_)
| project TotalCount = sum_count_
content.title: Total Messages Received

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type== "email_receipt"
| where Action in~ ("Acc", "RTY")
| summarize  count() by Direction, Action, ['Sender IP']
| summarize sum(count_)
| project TotalCount = sum_count_
content.title: Total Messages Accepted

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type== "email_receipt"
| where Action in~ ("REJ", "BNC")
| summarize  count() by Direction, Action, ['Sender IP']
| summarize sum(count_)
| project TotalCount = sum_count_

// Rej and Bnc are considered as blocked
content.title: Total Messages Rejected

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type== "email_receipt" and Action in~ ("Acc", "RTY")
| where isempty( ['TLS Version'])
| summarize  count() by Direction, Action, ['Sender IP']
| summarize sum(count_)
| project TotalCount = sum_count_

//Acc and Rty are considered as delivered
content.title: Total Messages Accepted without TLS

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type== "email_receipt" and Action in~ ("Acc", "RTY")
| make-series Count=count() default=0 on ['Event Time'] step 1d by Direction
content.title: Messages Accepted by Route

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type== "email_receipt" and Action in~ ("Acc", "RTY") and isnotempty( ['Sender IP'])
| extend senderGeoDetails = geo_info_from_ip_address(['Sender IP'])
| extend latitude = senderGeoDetails.latitude, longitude = senderGeoDetails.longitude, country = senderGeoDetails.country, state = senderGeoDetails.state, city = senderGeoDetails.city
| where isnotempty(latitude) and isnotempty(longitude)
| extend label = strcat(
    iif(strlen(city) > 0, strcat(city, ", "), ""),
    iif(strlen(state) > 0, strcat(state, ", "), ""),
    country
)
| extend label = trim(", ", label)
| extend label = iif(strlen(label) > 0, label, "N/A")
| summarize  count() by tostring(latitude), tostring(longitude), label
content.title: Messages Accepted by Source Country

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type== "email_receipt" and Action in~ ("REJ", "BNC") and isnotempty( ['Sender IP'])
| extend senderGeoDetails = geo_info_from_ip_address(['Sender IP'])
| extend latitude = senderGeoDetails.latitude, longitude = senderGeoDetails.longitude, country = senderGeoDetails.country, state = senderGeoDetails.state, city = senderGeoDetails.city
| where isnotempty(latitude) and isnotempty(longitude)
| extend label = strcat(
    iif(strlen(city) > 0, strcat(city, ", "), ""),
    iif(strlen(state) > 0, strcat(state, ", "), ""),
    country
)
| extend label = trim(", ", label)
| extend label = iif(strlen(label) > 0, label, "N/A")
| summarize  count() by tostring(latitude), tostring(longitude), label
content.title: Messages Rejected by Source Country

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_delivery" and Delivered == "true"
| summarize  count() by Direction , Delivered , ['Destination IP'] , ['TLS Used'] 
| summarize sum(count_)
| project TotalCount = sum_count_

| summarize sum(count_)
| project TotalCount = sum_count_

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_delivery" and Delivered == "true" and Direction == "Outbound"
| summarize Count = count() by Direction , Delivered , ['Destination IP'] , ['TLS Used'] 
| extend geo_info = geo_info_from_ip_address(['Destination IP'])
| extend latitude = geo_info.latitude, longitude = geo_info.longitude, country = geo_info.country , state = geo_info.state , city = geo_info.state
| where isnotempty(latitude) and isnotempty(longitude)
| extend label = strcat(
    iif(strlen(city) > 0, strcat(city, ", "), ""),
    iif(strlen(state) > 0, strcat(state, ", "), ""),
    country
)
| extend label = trim(", ", label)
| extend label = iif(strlen(label) > 0, label, "N/A")
content.title: Messages Delivered Outbound by Destination Country

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type =="email_antivirus"
| make-series Count=count() default=0 on ['Event Time'] step 1d by Route
content.title: Anti-Virus Traffic

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_receipt" and Action in~ ("Acc", "Rty") and ['Rejection Type'] =="Virus Signature Detection"
| summarize count()
content.title: Total Viruses Rejected

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_receipt" and isnotempty( ['Spam Info']) and ['Spam Info'] != "[]"
| summarize count()
content.title: Total Messages Rejected as Spam

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_process" and ['Hold Reason'] == "Spm"
| summarize count()
content.title: Total Messages Held as Spam

content.json: ðŸ’¡ To view message details, please click on any of the tiles above

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_receipt" and Action in~ ("Acc", "Rty") and ["Rejection Type"] =="Virus Signature Detection"
| project  ["Aggregate ID"], ["Recipients"] , ["Action"] , ["Event Time"] ,["Sender Envelope"] , ["Message ID"] , ["Subject"] , ["Number of Attachments"] , ["Type"] = Type, ["Sub Type"] ,  ["Sender IP"] , ["Direction"], ["Sender Header"] , ["TLS Version"] , ["TLS Cipher"] , ["Spam Info"] ,["Virus Found"] , ["Spam Processing Detail"],["Rejection Type"] ,["Rejection Code"], ["Rejection Info"] , ["Processing ID"] , ["Account ID"]
content.title: Viruses Rejected

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_receipt" and isnotempty(['Spam Info']) and ['Spam Info'] != "[]"
| project  ["Aggregate ID"], ["Recipients"] , ["Action"] , ["Event Time"] ,["Sender Envelope"] , ["Message ID"] , ["Subject"] , ["Number of Attachments"] , ["Type"] = Type, ["Sub Type"] ,  ["Sender IP"] , ["Direction"], ["Sender Header"] , ["TLS Version"] , ["TLS Cipher"] , ["Spam Info"] ,["Virus Found"] , ["Spam Processing Detail"],["Rejection Type"] ,["Rejection Code"], ["Rejection Info"] , ["Processing ID"] , ["Account ID"]
content.title: Messages Rejected as Spam

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_process" and ['Hold Reason'] == "Spm"
| project  ["Aggregate ID"], ["Recipients"] , ["Action"] , ["Event Time"],  ['Hold Reason'] ,["Sender Envelope"] , ["Message ID"] , ["Subject"] , ["Number of Attachments"] , ["Type"] = Type, ["Sub Type"] ,  ["Sender IP"] , ["Direction"], ["Sender Header"] , ["TLS Version"] , ["TLS Cipher"] , ["Spam Info"] ,["Virus Found"] , ["Spam Processing Detail"],["Rejection Type"] ,["Rejection Code"], ["Rejection Info"] , ["Processing ID"] , ["Account ID"]
content.title: Messages Held as Spam

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_receipt" and isnotempty(['Virus Found'])
| summarize Count = count() by ['Sender Envelope'] , Recipients , ['Sender IP'],['Virus Found'] , ['Event Time']
| sort by Count desc
| extend Sender = ['Sender Envelope'] , Recipient =  Recipients , ["Source IP"] = ['Sender IP'], ["Virus Name"] = ['Virus Found']
| project Sender, Recipient, ["Source IP"], ["Virus Name"], Count , ['Event Time']
| extend Count = iff(isnull(Count), 0, Count)
content.title: Messages Rejected Due to Virus

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_receipt" and isnotempty(['Spam Info'] ) and ['Spam Info'] != "[]"
| summarize Count = count() by ['Sender Envelope'] , Recipients , ['Sender IP'],['Spam Info'] , ['Event Time']
| sort by Count desc
| extend Sender = ['Sender Envelope'] , Recipient =  Recipients , ["Source IP"] = ['Sender IP'], ["Spam Information"]  = ['Spam Info'] 
| project Sender, Recipient, ["Source IP"], ["Spam Information"], Count ,['Event Time']
| extend Count = iff(isnull(Count), 0, Count)
content.title: Messages Rejected as Spam

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_delivery" and Delivered == "true" and isnotnull(['TLS Used'])
| make-series Count=count() default=0 on ['Event Time'] step 1d by ['TLS Used']
content.title: TLS Delivery

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_delivery" and Delivered== "true" and isnotempty(['TLS Version'])
| summarize Count = count(Recipients) by bin(['Event Time'] , 1d), ['TLS Version']
content.title: TLS Versions (Delivery)

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_receipt" and isnotempty(['TLS Version'])
| summarize Count = count(Recipients) by bin(['Event Time'] , 1d), ['TLS Version']
content.title: TLS Versions (Receipt)

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_delivery" and isnotempty(['TLS Cipher'])
| summarize count() by Cipher = ['TLS Cipher'] 
| sort by count_ desc
content.title: Delivery Ciphers

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_receipt" and isnotempty(['TLS Cipher'])
| summarize count() by Cipher = ['TLS Cipher'] 
| sort by count_ desc
content.title: Receipt Ciphers

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_delivery" and ['TLS Used'] == "No" and Delivered == "true"
| extend temp = split(Recipients, "@")
| extend ["Recipient Domain"] = tostring(temp[1])
| summarize Count = count() by ["Recipient Domain"] 
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top 10 Recipient Domains not Using TLS

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_receipt" and  Action in~ ("Acc", "Rty")  and isempty(['TLS Version'])
| extend temp = split(['Sender Envelope'], "@")
| extend ["Sending Domain"] = tostring(temp[1])
| summarize Count = count() by ["Sending Domain"] 
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top 10 Sending Domains not Using TLS

content.query:
MimecastDLP
| make-series Count=count() default=0 on ['Event Time'] step 1d by Action
content.title: Data Leak Prevention Events

content.query:
MimecastDLP
| summarize count() by Route
content.title: DLP Events by Route

content.query:
MimecastDLP
| summarize count() by Action
content.title: DLP Events by Actions Triggered

content.query:
MimecastDLP
| summarize count() by Policy
content.title: DLP Events by Policies Triggered

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_iep"
| make-series Count=count() default=0 on ['Event Time'] step 1d by Route
content.title: Internal Email Protection by Route

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_iep"
| project
    ['Aggregate ID'],
    ['Processing ID'] ,
    ['Account ID'] ,
    Type,
    ['Event Time'],
    ['Sender Envelope'] ,
    Subject,
    Recipients,
    ['Url Category'],
    ['Scan Results'] ,
    Route,
    ['Message ID'] ,
    ['Monitored Domain Source'] ,
    ['Similar Domain'] ,
    ['Sub Type']
content.title: Internal Event Protection Events

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_journal"
| make-series Count=count() default=0 on ['Event Time'] step 1d by Direction
content.title: Journal Messages by Direction

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_journal"
| project
    ['Aggregate ID'] ,
    ['Processing ID'],
    ['Account ID'],
    Type,
    ['Event Time'],
    ['Sender Envelope'] ,
    Recipients,
    Direction,
    ['Sub Type']
content.title: Journal Message Events

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type =="email_spam" and isnotempty(Route)
| make-series Count=count() default=0 on ['Event Time'] step 1d by Route
content.title: Spam Messages by Route

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_spam"
| project
    ['Aggregate ID'] ,
    ['Processing ID'],
    ['Account ID'] ,
    Type,
    ['Event Time'],
    ['Sender Envelope'] ,
    Subject,
    Recipients,
    ['Sender IP'] ,
    ['Sender Domain'] ,
    ['Sender Header'],
    Route,
    ['Sub Type']
content.title: Spam Message Events

content.query:
MimecastCG
| where Type == "email_spam" and isnotempty(['Sender IP'])
| extend senderGeoDetails = geo_info_from_ip_address(['Sender IP'])
| extend latitude = senderGeoDetails.latitude, longitude = senderGeoDetails.longitude, country = senderGeoDetails.country, state = senderGeoDetails.state, city = senderGeoDetails.city
| where isnotempty(latitude) and isnotempty(longitude)
| extend label = strcat(
    iif(strlen(city) > 0, strcat(city, ", "), ""),
    iif(strlen(state) > 0, strcat(state, ", "), ""),
    country
)
| extend label = trim(", ", label)
| extend label = iif(strlen(label) > 0, label, "N/A")
| summarize  count() by tostring(latitude), tostring(longitude), label
content.title: Spam Messages by Source Country

content.json: #### ðŸ“ ***Refresh the web page to fetch details of recently collected events***
